Comment.val:
Program can be used to add all columns of a table to QCOL (most usefull for tables like client with 250+ columns)
Table must alread be defined in QTBL
Usage Generate (ctrl-g) a browse program for the table to add. Add call to GenerateQCOL in task prefix of this browse (parameter: var-literal of first field to add) Run browse program.
Note -Columns will be added as disabled for OXA400 -QCOL_ALIASNAME will be written as mlstrans( column name )

Text.val: This program is intended to prevent typing errors while adding large tables
(i.e. with many columns) to the OXA400 configuration table QCOL
Program should be used in conjunction with a simlpe generated browse
to extract meta data via a variable scan
Since column is unique and tables with > 100 fields will be added
the previous system for assigning IDs can not be followed
new fields (added after 03.06.2004) will get as ID:
10.02.2011 SH SCR15765 Removed MlsTrans to store QCOL_ALIASNAME;
added missing QCOL fields; addde call GB604
Work fields numeric to decimal conversion
Numeric with decimals.convert picture to SQL decimal format
